DOC.brief_summary: Data Collection Registry HeRO Graft End Stage Renal Disease Patients Receiving Hemodialysis
DOC.brief_title: Data Collection Registry HeRO Graft End Stage Renal Disease Patients Receiving Hemodialysis
DOC.detailed_description: Data collection include medical history , operative procedure data , follow-up data every six month use HeRO Graft dialysis , include : - Post-operative complication HeRO Graft implantation - Length time insertion use HeRO Graft - Incidence thrombosis - Hospitalizations - Incidence infection adverse event occurrence - Mortality - Hemoglobin - Kt/V - pre-dialysis blood pressure - post-dialysis blood pressure - blood flow rate - dialysis flow rate
DOC.criteria: All patient eligible HeRO Graft dialysis access Age great 18 year old Able give inform consent Subjects kind disorder compromise ability subject give inform consent and/or comply study procedure ; Any medical condition opinion investigator may pose safety risk subject study may interfere study participation .
